methods.desc: Gets up to the last n lines in the console where n is the limit passed. Returned as an array of JSON stream objects
args: The maximum number of items to return
methods.name: streams.console.latest

methods.desc: Gets up to the last n player egg throw events where n is the limit passed. Returned as an array of JSON stream objects
args: The maximum number of items to return
methods.name: streams.egg.latest

methods.desc: Gets up to the last n lines in chat where n is the limit passed. Returned as an array of JSON stream objects
args: The maximum number of items to return
methods.name: streams.chat.latest

methods.desc: Gets up to the last n lines in formatted_chat where n is the limit passed. Returned as an array of JSON stream objects
args: The maximum number of items to return
methods.name: streams.formatted_chat.latest

methods.desc: Returns all the messages in a stream with the given name
returns: An array of message objects which are different for each kind of stream
args: The maximum number of items to return
methods.name: streams.name.limit

methods.desc: Gets up to the last n connections.disconnections where n is the limit passed. Returned as an array of JSON stream objects
args: The maximum number of items to return
methods.name: streams.connections.limit
